languages.text: "Как я и обещала ранее, мои ребята станут вашими глазами и ушами по всему {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простору{/g}, дайте им только время, шерин. Ну а на Даргонус уже спешит помощница официального имперского представителя Джай Хейдари, дабы предоставить вашим людям и вам, о влады{mf|ка|чица} миров, товары редчайшего мастерства и происхождения". {n}Темные глаза сияют озорными искрами в полумраке мостика.{/n} "И еще раз... благодарю от всей своей скромной души, шерин, и предлагаю отпраздновать это с моими людьми, как только окажемся на Футфоле!"

"As I promised before, my crew will be your eyes and ears across the entire {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}, shereen, just give them time. And of course, the assistant to Official Trade Representative Jae Heydari is already rushing to Dargonus to deliver goods of rare and exquisite quality to you and your people, o {mf|master|mistress} of many worlds." {n}Jae's eyes shine playfully in the perpetual half-light of the bridge.{/n} "And once again... Thank you, shereen, from the bottom of my humble heart."
languages.original_text: "Как я и обещала ранее, мои ребята станут вашими глазами и ушами по всему {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простору{/g}, дайте им только время, шерин. Ну а на Даргонус уже спешит помощница официального имперского представителя Джай Хейдари, дабы предоставить вашим людям и вам, о влады{mf|ка|чица} миров, товары редчайшего мастерства и происхождения". {n}Темные глаза сияют озорными искрами в полумраке мостика.{/n} "И еще раз... благодарю от всей своей скромной души, шерин, и предлагаю отпраздновать это с моими людьми, как только окажемся на Футфоле!"

Thank you, shereen, from the bottom of my humble heart."

Thank you, shereen, from the bottom of my humble heart."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “就像我之前承诺过的那样，我的所有手下都会成为你在整个{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的耳目，亲爱的，只要给他们些时间就好了。当然，帝国官方贸易代表婕伊·海达利的助手已经在全速赶往达戈努斯，为你和你的人民带去稀有而精美的货物，噢，万千世界的{mf|主人|女主人}。”{n}在舰桥的流明灯下，婕伊的双眼闪烁着俏皮的光芒。{/n}“再一次……谢谢你，亲爱的，发自我卑微的心底。”
languages.original_text: "As I promised before, my crew will be your eyes and ears across the entire {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}, shereen, just give them time. And of course, the assistant to Official Trade Representative Jae Heydari is already rushing to Dargonus to deliver goods of rare and exquisite quality to you and your people, o {mf|master|mistress} of many worlds." {n}Jae's eyes shine playfully in the perpetual half-light of the bridge.{/n} "And once again... Thank you, shereen, from the bottom of my humble heart."

traits.locale_text: “就像我之前承诺过的那样，我的所有手下都会成为你在整个{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的耳目，亲爱的，只要给他们些时间就好了。当然，帝国官方贸易代表婕伊·海达利的助手已经在全速赶往达戈努斯，为你和你的人民带去稀有而精美的货物，噢，万千世界的{mf|主人|女主人}。”{n}在舰桥的流明灯下，婕伊的双眼闪烁着俏皮的光芒。{/n}“再一次……谢谢你，亲爱的，发自我卑微的心底。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Como prometí, mi grupo será sus ojos y sus oídos por toda la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión{/g}, shereen, solo tiene que darles tiempo. Y, por supuesto, la asistente de representante comercial oficial Jae Heydari ya está volando hacia Dargonus para entregar productos de calidad rara y exquisita a usted y los suyos, señor{mf||a} de cientos de mundos». {n}Los ojos de Jae relucen juguetones bajo la media luz perpetua del puente.{/n} «Y, una vez más... gracias, shereen, desde lo más hondo de mi humilde corazón».
languages.original_text: "As I promised before, my crew will be your eyes and ears across the entire {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}, shereen, just give them time. And of course, the assistant to Official Trade Representative Jae Heydari is already rushing to Dargonus to deliver goods of rare and exquisite quality to you and your people, o {mf|master|mistress} of many worlds." {n}Jae's eyes shine playfully in the perpetual half-light of the bridge.{/n} "And once again... Thank you, shereen, from the bottom of my humble heart."

traits.locale_text: «Como prometí, mi grupo será sus ojos y sus oídos por toda la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión{/g}, shereen, solo tiene que darles tiempo. Y, por supuesto, la asistente de representante comercial oficial Jae Heydari ya está volando hacia Dargonus para entregar productos de calidad rara y exquisita a usted y los suyos, señor{mf||a} de cientos de mundos». {n}Los ojos de Jae relucen juguetones bajo la media luz perpetua del puente.{/n} «Y, una vez más... gracias, shereen, desde lo más hondo de mi humilde corazón».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「前にも約束したように、あたしのクルーは{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}エクスパンス{/g}全域であんたの目となり耳となる。そしてもちろん、ジェイ・ヘイダリ交易代表のアシスタントはすでにダルゴナスに急行して、あんたとその保護領民に希少で最高品質の商品を届けているのよ」{n}ジェイの目が、ブリッジの半分だけ照らされた永遠の光の中で、いたずらっぽく輝いている。{/n}「もう一度礼を言っておくわね、シャリーン。心からの」
languages.original_text: "As I promised before, my crew will be your eyes and ears across the entire {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}, shereen, just give them time. And of course, the assistant to Official Trade Representative Jae Heydari is already rushing to Dargonus to deliver goods of rare and exquisite quality to you and your people, o {mf|master|mistress} of many worlds." {n}Jae's eyes shine playfully in the perpetual half-light of the bridge.{/n} "And once again... Thank you, shereen, from the bottom of my humble heart."

traits.locale_text: 「前にも約束したように、あたしのクルーは{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}エクスパンス{/g}全域であんたの目となり耳となる。そしてもちろん、ジェイ・ヘイダリ交易代表のアシスタントはすでにダルゴナスに急行して、あんたとその保護領民に希少で最高品質の商品を届けているのよ」{n}ジェイの目が、ブリッジの半分だけ照らされた永遠の光の中で、いたずらっぽく輝いている。{/n}「もう一度礼を言っておくわね、シャリーン。心からの」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Comme je vous l'ai promis, mes hommes seront vos yeux et vos oreilles dans toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues{/g}, shereen. Donnez-leur juste un peu de temps. Et bien sûr, l'assistant de la représentante commerciale officielle Jae Heydari est déjà en route pour Dargonus afin d'y livrer des marchandises de qualité supérieure à l'intention de votre peuple, ô {mf|maître|maîtresse} de bien des mondes, {n}ajoute Jae d'un air malicieux.{/n} Et encore une fois... Merci, shereen. Du plus profond de mon humble cœur. »
languages.original_text: "As I promised before, my crew will be your eyes and ears across the entire {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}, shereen, just give them time. And of course, the assistant to Official Trade Representative Jae Heydari is already rushing to Dargonus to deliver goods of rare and exquisite quality to you and your people, o {mf|master|mistress} of many worlds." {n}Jae's eyes shine playfully in the perpetual half-light of the bridge.{/n} "And once again... Thank you, shereen, from the bottom of my humble heart."

traits.locale_text: « Comme je vous l'ai promis, mes hommes seront vos yeux et vos oreilles dans toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues{/g}, shereen. Donnez-leur juste un peu de temps. Et bien sûr, l'assistant de la représentante commerciale officielle Jae Heydari est déjà en route pour Dargonus afin d'y livrer des marchandises de qualité supérieure à l'intention de votre peuple, ô {mf|maître|maîtresse} de bien des mondes,ajoute Jae d'un air malicieux.{/n} Et encore une fois... Merci, shereen. Du plus profond de mon humble cœur. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wie versprochen wird meine Crew in der gesamten {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Ausdehnung{/g} als Eure Augen und Ohren dienen, Shereen, lasst Ihnen nur etwas Zeit. Und natürlich eilt der Assistent der Offiziellen Handelsvertreterin Jae Heydari bereits nach Dargonus, um Euch und Eurem seltene und exquisite Waren zu liefern, o {mf|Herr|Herrin} vieler Welten." {n}Jaes Augen leuchten in dem ewigen Halblicht der Brücke verschmitzt auf.{/n} "Und erneut ... Danke, Shereen, von tiefstem Herzen und voller Demut."
languages.original_text: "As I promised before, my crew will be your eyes and ears across the entire {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}, shereen, just give them time. And of course, the assistant to Official Trade Representative Jae Heydari is already rushing to Dargonus to deliver goods of rare and exquisite quality to you and your people, o {mf|master|mistress} of many worlds." {n}Jae's eyes shine playfully in the perpetual half-light of the bridge.{/n} "And once again... Thank you, shereen, from the bottom of my humble heart."

traits.locale_text: "Wie versprochen wird meine Crew in der gesamten {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Ausdehnung{/g} als Eure Augen und Ohren dienen, Shereen, lasst Ihnen nur etwas Zeit. Und natürlich eilt der Assistent der Offiziellen Handelsvertreterin Jae Heydari bereits nach Dargonus, um Euch und Eurem seltene und exquisite Waren zu liefern, o {mf|Herr|Herrin} vieler Welten." {n}Jaes Augen leuchten in dem ewigen Halblicht der Brücke verschmitzt auf.{/n} "Und erneut ... Danke, Shereen, von tiefstem Herzen und voller Demut."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "As I promised before, my crew will be your eyes and ears across the entire Expanse, shereen, just give them time. And of course, the assistant to Official Trade Representative Jae Heydari is already rushing to Dargonus to deliver goods of rare and exquisite quality to you and your people, o {mf|master|mistress} of many worlds." {n}Jae's eyes shine playfully in the perpetual half-light of the bridge.{/n} "And once again... Thank you, shereen, from the bottom of my humble heart."

languages.text: "Söz verdiğim üzere mürettebatım, tüm {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Enginlik'te {/g} senin gözün, kulağın olacak. Sadece biraz zaman alacak şirinim. Ayrıca elbette ki Resmî Ticaret Temsilcisi Jae Heydari'nin asistanı, nadir ve eşsiz kalitede ürünleri sana, yani sayısız dünyanın efendisine ve onun halkına ulaştırmak adına Dargonus'a doğru yola çıktı bile." {n}Jae'ın gözleri, köprünün loş ışığında neşeyle parlıyor.{/n} "Bu naçiz yüreğimin en derinlerinden bir kez daha teşekkürler şirinim."
languages.original_text: "As I promised before, my crew will be your eyes and ears across the entire {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}, shereen, just give them time. And of course, the assistant to Official Trade Representative Jae Heydari is already rushing to Dargonus to deliver goods of rare and exquisite quality to you and your people, o {mf|master|mistress} of many worlds." {n}Jae's eyes shine playfully in the perpetual half-light of the bridge.{/n} "And once again... Thank you, shereen, from the bottom of my humble heart."

traits.locale_text: "Söz verdiğim gibi, mürettebatım tüm {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Enginlik{/g} boyunca senin gözlerin ve kulakların olacak. Sadece biraz zaman vermen gerek şirinim. Ayrıca elbette ki Resmî Ticaret Temsilcisi Jae Heydari'nin asistanı, nadir ve eşsiz kalitede ürünleri sana, yani sayısız dünyanın efendisine ve onun halkına ulaştırmak adına Dargonus'a doğru yola çıktı bile." {n}Jae'ın gözleri, köprünün loş ışığında neşeyle parlıyor.{/n} "Bu naçiz yüreğimin en derinlerinden bir kez daha teşekkürler şirinim."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
